comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: John Herndon "Johnny" Mercer (November 18, 1909 – June 25, 1976) was an American lyricist, songwriter and singer. He wrote the lyrics to more than fifteen hundred songs en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johnny_Mercer

comment.author: 86886338@N00
comment._content: I think Mercer did as much TV as Dizzy.

comment.author: 62319819@N05
comment._content: he was a great talent ---I was in two of his Broadway shows-Lil Abner and Top Banana---when he was drunk and in N.Y. he used to send me love notes and I would read them to the girls in the chorus dressing room---and we would giggle like idiots ---which we were --oh! to be young and stupid----and that's what I was---to make fun of such a sweet talented man---Hope Holiday
